doc.title: Romancing the Australian Outback
doc.text: What/WP was/VBD your/PRP$ first/JJ contact/NN with/IN Australia/NNP ?/. I/PRP remember/VB mine/PRP very/RB clearly/JJ ./. My/PRP$ uncle/NN had/VBD just/RB come/VB back/RB from/IN his/PRP$ studies/NN in/IN the/DT University/NN of/IN Western/NNP Australia/NNP and/CC bought/VBD me/PRP one/CD of/IN those/DT stuffed/JJ Koala/NN Bears/NN with/IN a/DT windup/JJ musical/NN box/NN in/IN the/DT belly/NN ./. Being/VBG an/DT aspiring/JJ surgeon/NN ,/, I/PRP wanted/VBD to/TO know/VB how/RB the/DT musical/NN box/NN worked/VBD ,/, so/RB that/WDT was/VBD when/WRB I/PRP performed/VBD my/PRP$ first/JJ surgical/NN procedure/NN ./. It/PRP was/VBD interesting/JJ to/TO learn/VB that/IN the/DT tune/NN was/VBD produced/VBD by/IN a/DT comb/NN of/IN different/JJ lengths/NN being/NN was/VBD ``/RB plucked/JJ ''/NN by/IN a/DT revolving/JJ drum/NN ./. Of/IN course/NN I/PRP got/VBD scolded/VBN by/IN my/PRP$ mom/NN who/WP said/JJ that/WDT I/PRP was/VBD a/DT little/JJ destroyer/NN ./. However/RB ,/, that/IN tune/NN was/VBD etched/VBN in/IN my/PRP$ memory/NN forever/NN ./. It/PRP was/VBD when/WRB I/PRP went/VBD to/TO Australia/NNP for/IN my/PRP$ studies/NN that/WDT I/PRP found/VBD out/IN that/IN the/DT haunting/JJ tune/NN was/VBD none/JJ other/JJ than/IN that/WDT all/DT time/NN favorite/NN Aussie/NN bush/NN ballad/NN ,/, Waltzing/NN Matilda/NN ./.
